crawler_amazon module¶

Created on Dez 01, 2015

author:Enrico Reich

This is a crawler for the links to Privacy Agreements in Amazon app store.

crawler_amazon.crawl(database='amazon.db', maxVisits=1000, maxApps=1000)¶

crawl amazon store, save visited links as well as links to app products and write to sqlite database.

Parameters:
  • database – name of the target database where the results will be stored
  • maxVisits – maximum number of sites to visited
  • maxApps – maximum number of apps to use
crawler_amazon.getAppTitle(html)¶
Parameters:html – the html file as string Object
Returns:string with apps title (caption of amazon page)
crawler_amazon.getPP(html)¶
Parameters:html – the html file as string object
Returns:list with url to privacy policy (or empty list)
crawler_amazon.getPermissions(html)¶
Parameters:html – the html file as string object
Returns:list with apps permissions (as string)
